hero.heading: Lakefront dining in the heart of Uzungöl
hero.subheading: Local Black Sea flavors meet timeless hospitality on the water's edge.

highlights.body1: Fresh local produce and regional specialties prepared with care.
highlights.body2: An open‑air setting overlooking the lake and pine forests.
highlights.body3: Spacious seating with options for groups and celebrations.

menu.intro: Our menu blends the best of the Black Sea with beloved Turkish and select Middle Eastern dishes. Availability may change with the season.
menu.allergens: Please inform our team of any allergies. We will do our best to accommodate.

about.heading: Rooted in Uzungöl since 2009
about.body: Ada Restaurant grew beside the lake, where wooden decks meet fresh mountain air. Our team welcomes guests from Türkiye and around the world with a sincere approach to hospitality and a seasonal, region‑driven menu.

reservations.heading: Reservations & Contact
reservations.body: For same‑day bookings, please call or message us on WhatsApp. For groups and special occasions, share your preferred date, time, and party size.

policies.title: Reservation Policies
policies.groupBookings: For 8+ guests, a confirmation message is required.
policies.noShow: Tables are held for 15 minutes past reservation time.
policies.specialRequests: Let us know about seating preferences or celebrations.

location.heading: Location & Hours
location.body: Yenimahalle, Fevzi Çakmak Caddesi No:15/A, Uzungöl — a short walk from the lakeside promenade. Parking and prayer room availability to be confirmed.

footer.address: Yenimahalle, Fevzi Çakmak Cd. No:15/A, Uzungöl, Çaykara/Trabzon
